= Introduction =

Here you'll find some small code snippet to illustrate the use of redtamarin.


= unistd =

{{{
import C.unistd.sleep;

trace( "sleep 5sec..." );
sleep( 5 ); //in seconds
trace( "...and wake up" );
}}}

{{{
import C.unistd.getcwd;

trace( "current working directory: " + getcwd() );
}}}
